fields.name: Fruit Medley
fields.nutrition: 2 Cups Blueberries, 2 Cups Strawberries Quartered, 1/2 Cup Jicama Chopped,1/3 Cup Red Onion Chopped,3 Tablespoons Basil Finely Chopped,2 Tablespoons Lemon Juice Fresh,1 Tablespoon Blueberry Agave Nectar, 1 Tablespoon Coconut Flakes. 459 calories

fields.name: Ham and Veggie Omelet
fields.nutrition: PAM® Butter No-Stick Cooking Spray, 1/2 cup thinly sliced green bell pepper, 1/2 cup thinly sliced red bell pepper, 1/2 cup chopped fully cooked lean ham, 1/4 cup thinly sliced yellow onion, 8 eggs, lightly beaten, 1/2 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, divided. 255 calories

fields.name: Shrimp Garden Salad
fields.nutrition: 6 Cooked Jumbo Cocktail Shrimp, tail on, thawed, 1 egg, hard boiled, peeled and chopped, 2 Tbsp Spicy Italian Dressing, 1/2 cup(s) celery, chopped , 1 red onion, rings separated , 1/4 cup(s) red bell pepper , 2 cup(s) Garden Salad.270 calories

fields.name: Taco Bowl
fields.nutrition: Brown rice (can sub with white rice or cauliflower rice for a low-carb option), Boneless, skinless chicken breast, Olive oil, Seasonings: salt, pepper, garlic powder, cilantro, ground cumin, smoked paprika, chili powder, onion powder,Veggies: cherry tomatoes, minced garlic, scallions, corn, black beans, red onion, Limes, Cream cheese, Cashew milk, Cheddar cheese. 655 calories

fields.name: Overnight oats
fields.nutrition: ½ cup old fashioned oats, ½ cup oat milk (or milk of your choice), ¼ cup yogurt of your choice, 1 tablespoon honey or maple syrup (optional), Handful of fresh berries, Handful of chopped nuts. 516 calories.

fields.name: Steak Stir Fry
fields.nutrition: 5 oz lean grilling steak, 2 cups mixed veggies (onion, peppers, snow peas, carrots, etc), 1 tbsp olive oil,1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp teriyaki sauce, 1 tsp each ground garlic and ground ginger, Optional: 1 tsp hot chili flakes. 478 calories

fields.name: Potato Chicken Noodle Soup
fields.nutrition: 3-1/2 quarts Water, 1 medium Onion finely chopped, 5 tablespoons chicken flavored Better Than Bullion, 2 tablespoons Butter, 2-3 medium carrots grated, 3-4 chicken tenders (fresh or thawed) cut into 1/2 inch pieces, 1 cup elbow macaroni noodles, 2-3 Potatoes peeled and sliced,3 tablespoons dill fresh or frozen, salt and pepper to taste. 175 calories

fields.name: Stuffed Chicken and Asparagus Galore
fields.nutrition: 1 boneless and skinless chicken breasts, 1/2 tbsp garlic parsley salt, 1/4 tbsp paprika,  1 1/2 tbsp Unsalted Butter, 1 1/2 oz softened cream cheese, 1/8 cup parmesan cheese, 1/2 tbsp mayonnaise, 1/4 cup chopped spinach, 1/2 galic cloves pressed. 350 calories
